quest.name: Crate Expectations
journal: Spiraling Path needs you to journey down the road.
A covert supply troupe disguised as miners has left without a crate of scimitars. Spiraling Path bids you see the blades safely to their hands.
Dodoroba thanks you for bringing the crate of scimitars. Return to Camp Bluefog and inform Spiraling Path of your success.
The weapons are bound for where they are most needed, and with an adventurer assisting in their delivery, the Garleans will be none the wiser.
objectives: Deliver the Immortal Flames scimitars to Dodoroba.

dialogue.name: SPIRALINGPATH
dialogue.text: The key to victory is the element of surprise, and the key to surprise is secrecy. We don the guises of miners to cloak our supply movements from the Garlean sentinels.

dialogue.name: SPIRALINGPATH
dialogue.text: The last shipment to leave us, however, appears to be short a crate of arms, which could prove an unfortunate surprise for the brigade expecting it.

dialogue.name: SPIRALINGPATH
dialogue.text: The troupe makes its way to the eastern watchtower. It is my hope you might catch them and deliver these scimitars.

dialogue.name: ENPC
dialogue.text: As you can plainly see, we are miners hauling a load of ore, and haven't the time for small talk.

dialogue.name: ENPC
dialogue.text: Ah! These scimitars were supposed to be part of the load!

dialogue.name: ENPC
dialogue.text: It was wise of them not to send a Flame, as it would've drawn unwanted attention. Thank you, adventurer.

dialogue.name: SPIRALINGPATH
dialogue.text: I am relieved you have returned safely to us, and that the weapons will reach their destination unhindered.

dialogue.name: SPIRALINGPATH
dialogue.text: Movements to and around the borderlands of Thanalan fall under constant scrutiny. One misstep could spark a fire that will consume all the realm.
